comment: I too wanna make a guild. Though I'm not sure what niche we could fill that isn't already filled with the three main ones. If you wanna go RP but also wanna not RP sometimes, you can do that in the Writ Keepers already, and the super serious Crimson Guardians has been around longer and has a bigger base, so we'd be slow to build a rival Guild. And there's already a guild for filthy casuals.
name: Anonymous
